tool.name: SAGA.ta_channels.4
tool.description: Overland Flow Distance to Channel Network
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayELEVATION False isArrayCHANNELS False isArrayROUTE False isArrayFIELDS False isArrayFLOW_K False isArrayFLOW_R False output_data_DISTANCE $output_data_DISTANCE output_data_DISTVERT $output_data_DISTVERT output_data_DISTHORZ $output_data_DISTHORZ output_data_TIME $output_data_TIME output_data_SDR $output_data_SDR output_data_PASSES $output_data_PASSES name SAGA.ta_channels.4 ELEVATION $ELEVATION CHANNELS $CHANNELS ROUTE $ROUTE FIELDS $FIELDS METHOD $METHOD BOUNDARY $BOUNDARY FLOW_B $FLOW_B FLOW_K $FLOW_K FLOW_K_DEFAULT $FLOW_K_DEFAULT FLOW_R $FLOW_R FLOW_R_DEFAULT $FLOW_R_DEFAULT prefer $prefer response $response outputType_DISTANCE $OutputSection_DISTANCE.outputType_DISTANCE transmissionMode_DISTANCE $OutputSection_DISTANCE.transmissionMode_DISTANCE outputType_DISTVERT $OutputSection_DISTVERT.outputType_DISTVERT transmissionMode_DISTVERT $OutputSection_DISTVERT.transmissionMode_DISTVERT outputType_DISTHORZ $OutputSection_DISTHORZ.outputType_DISTHORZ transmissionMode_DISTHORZ $OutputSection_DISTHORZ.transmissionMode_DISTHORZ outputType_TIME $OutputSection_TIME.outputType_TIME transmissionMode_TIME $OutputSection_TIME.transmissionMode_TIME outputType_SDR $OutputSection_SDR.outputType_SDR transmissionMode_SDR $OutputSection_SDR.transmissionMode_SDR outputType_PASSES $OutputSection_PASSES.outputType_PASSES transmissionMode_PASSES $OutputSection_PASSES.transmissionMode_PASSES

param.name: ELEVATION
param.label: Elevation
param.help: A grid that contains elevation data. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, tiff, png

param.name: CHANNELS
param.label: Channel Network
param.help: A grid providing information about the channel network. It is assumed that no-data cells are not part of the channel network. Vice versa all others cells are recognised as channel network members. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, tiff, png

param.name: ROUTE
param.label: Preferred Routing
param.help: Downhill flow is bound to preferred routing cells, where these are not no-data. Helps to model e.g. small ditches, that are not well represented in the elevation data. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, tiff, png

param.name: FIELDS
param.label: Fields
param.help: If set, output is given about the number of fields a flow path visits downhill. For D8 only. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, tiff, png

param.name: METHOD
param.label: Flow Algorithm
param.help: Choose a flow routing algorithm that shall be used for the overland flow distance calculation:<br/>- D8<br/>- MFD

param.name: BOUNDARY
param.label: Boundary Cells
param.help: Take cells at the boundary of the DEM as channel.

param.name: FLOW_B
param.label: Beta
param.help: catchment specific parameter for sediment delivery ratio calculation

param.name: FLOW_K
param.label: Manning-Strickler Coefficient
param.help: Manning-Strickler coefficient for flow travel time estimation (reciprocal of Manning's Roughness Coefficient) The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, tiff, png

param.name: FLOW_K_DEFAULT
param.label: Default
param.help: default value if no grid has been selected

param.name: FLOW_R
param.label: Flow Depth
param.help: flow depth [m] for flow travel time estimation The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, tiff, png

param.name: FLOW_R_DEFAULT
param.label: Default
param.help: default value if no grid has been selected

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_DISTANCE
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_DISTANCE
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_DISTVERT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_DISTVERT
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_DISTHORZ
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_DISTHORZ
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_TIME
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_TIME
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_SDR
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_SDR
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_PASSES
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_PASSES
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: This tool calculates overland flow distances to a channel network based on gridded digital elevation data and channel network information. The flow algorithm may be either Deterministic 8 (O'Callaghan & Mark 1984) or Multiple Flow Direction (Freeman 1991). Sediment Delivery Rates (SDR) according to Ali & De Boer (2010) can be computed optionally.
